content.html:
Related notes
How to list all projects in Gitlab, How to list all projects in Github

Install the bbcli with:

pacaur -S bbcli

Auth with:

bb auth login

At the writing of this, the tool doesn’t seem to support oauth and bitbucket seems to be enforcing it recently. So I am abandoning this. I think I will move out of bitbucket anyway.
